example.eg: Cheri couldn't see ahead; too many people were blocking her view.
example.egtrans: 谢利看不到前面，太多人挡住她的视线了。

example.eg: Neil is getting ahead in the race!
example.egtrans: 尼尔在比赛中领先。

example.eg: The race is in its final lap, and Ivy is ahead of everyone.
example.egtrans: 比赛已经进入最后一圈，艾薇处在领先的位置。

example.eg: The truck ahead of ours has a flat tire.
example.egtrans: 我们车前面的卡车轮胎瘪了。

example.eg: Thank goodness we finished that project ahead of the deadline.
example.egtrans: 谢天谢地，我们在截止日期前完成了那个项目。

example.eg: We couldn't move because there was an accident ahead of us.
example.egtrans: 我们动不了，因为前面出了事故。

example.eg: John arrived at the restaurant ahead of his brother.
example.egtrans: 约翰在他哥哥之前到达饭馆。

example.eg: Jon is ahead of the other children in his reading ability. This car is far ahead of the others in overall handling and safety.
example.egtrans: 乔恩的阅读能力优于其他小孩。在整体操作和安全性能方面，这辆车都远优于其他。

example.eg: At the end of the second half, the home team was ahead.
example.egtrans: 在第二半场结束时，主场队暂时领先。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 暂时领先的, 暂列第一的

example.eg: I look forward to working with you in the weeks ahead.
example.egtrans: 我很期待在未来的几周里与你一起共事。

example.eg: Compared to the UK, Sweden is ahead in terms of employment security.
Jared forged ahead despite the bad weather.
example.egtrans: 尽管天气不好，杰瑞德还是继续前进。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 稳步前进, 奋勇前进

dsense.name: forge ahead with [sth], forge on with [sth]

example.eg: Forge ahead with your life; don't let negativity get the better of you.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 锐意进取, 努力开拓

example.eg: In order to get ahead in business, you need to be assertive.
example.egtrans: 想要在生意上取得成功，你需要坚定而自信。

example.eg: He ran faster and got ahead of his sister just as they reached the car.
example.egtrans: 他跑得更快，并在抵达车子的时候超过了姐姐。

example.eg: The company got ahead by adopting a new business model.
example.egtrans: 通过采取一种新的商业模式，那家公司取得了优势。

example.eg: The firm developed a multimedia game system that allowed it to get ahead of its rivals.
example.egtrans: 该公司开发了一种多媒体游戏系统使自己领先于竞争者。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 领先于, 胜过, 比…更为成功

example.eg: Keeping a monthly budget is a good way to get ahead.
example.egtrans: 维持月度预算是一个攒钱的好办法。

example.eg: I can't come with you this weekend after all, but don't let that stop you; you go ahead.
example.egtrans: 我周末还是不能和你一起去了，但别因为这个就放弃，你按原计划进行吧。

example.eg: The meeting will go ahead.
example.egtrans: 会议将如期举行。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 领先, 保持领先地位

example.eg: Jill is trying to keep ahead of the weeds in her garden.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 预先处理，提前处理, 提前完成

example.eg: No matter our plans, we never really know what lies ahead.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 等在前方, 即将发生

example.eg: When you are the driver, it's best to look ahead on the road.
example.egtrans: 你开车的时候，最好看着道路前方。

example.eg: The company is looking ahead to the future and hopes to expand its business.
example.egtrans: 公司正在展望未来，并期望拓展业务。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 展望未来, 为未来预作计划

example.eg: It's a good thing you planned ahead, otherwise we might have never found a hotel.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 预先筹划, 提前规划

example.eg: Despite the setbacks, we need to plow ahead with the project so we can finish it by the deadline.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 奋力前进, 埋头苦干

example.eg: Despite the worsening weather conditions, the explorers decided to press on with their journey.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使负担沉重, 把…强加给
移至前方, 拉至前方, 提前
赶上, 赶超, 领先

example.eg: Although the path was becoming very steep, the hikers decided to push ahead.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 坚持前进, 继续前进, 克服苦难前进
推动..., 推进..., 推行..., 促进...向前

example.eg: Belinda told Cristal to run ahead to try to catch the bus before it leaves.
When I pack for a vacation, I try to think ahead and bring all the items that I might need.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 为未来做打算, 长远考虑

dsense.name: ahead of its time, ahead of the times

example.eg: The company prides itself on bringing products to market that are ahead of their time.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 先进的, 超越其时代的，领先于其时代的

dsense.name: ahead of its time, ahead of the times

example.eg: This diary reveals that some men in the past were ahead of the times with regard to women's rights.
example.egtrans: 这本日记表明在过去有些男性在女权上的看法已超越了其所处的时代。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 走在前端, 引领潮流

example.eg: Bruce was ahead of the game because he repaired the roof before the rains came.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 成为赢家, 立于不败

example.eg: They estimated that the new Olympic stadium would be ready in September 2011 but actually it was finished ahead of time.
example.egtrans: 他们原来预计新奥林匹克场馆将于2011年9月建成，但实际却提早完工了。

example.eg: He was able to put the wallpaper up fast because I had primed the plaster ahead of time.
You can't possibly miss the target: it's dead ahead!

dsense.name: far ahead
dsense.guideword: (in the distance in front of you)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 遥遥领先, 远远超过

example.eg: The enemy's approaching from the south – full speed ahead!

dsense.name: give [sb] the go-ahead, give the go-ahead to [sb]

example.eg: Yes, of course you can have a snack; go ahead and help yourself to whatever you want.
example.egtrans: 是的，你当然可以吃零食了。去吧，你想吃什么就吃什么。

example.eg: Sarah's parents said she couldn't go to the party, but she went ahead and did it anyway.
example.egtrans: 莎拉的父母说她不能去参加派对，但她还是去了。//我没有时间问老板是否要我去处理这个问题，于是我就这么做了。

example.eg: Developers have got the go-ahead from the council to build on the site.
example.egtrans: 开发商已从那个委员会取得了在该处建房的许可。

dsense.name: go-ahead
dsense.guideword: informal (goal: puts score, team ahead) (得分)

example.eg: The batter hit a go-ahead home run.
Looking ahead, we need to plan for next year.
Trevor walked into the supermarket, pushing the trolley ahead.
She looked straight ahead in order to avoid eye contact with him.

dsense.name: up ahead
dsense.guideword: (at some distance in front of you)

example.eg: With these guys in office who knows what lies ahead?

trans_examp.trans_cn: 未来的道路上有什么等着？将来会发生什么？
